website_summaries.verdict: A premium laundry detergent that offers a great mix of affordability and quality.
pros: Delivers up to 6 times the cleaning versus other leading detergents
Combats tough odors and leaves behind a refreshing original scent
Recommended by leading washing machine manufacturers
cons: May be more expensive than many comparable detergents

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper by the ounce than from the grocery store
customer_reviews.text: A 100oz bottle in the grocery store is about 12 cents an ounce at $11.99, these 3 pouches total 144oz for 11 cents an ounce (at $15.29 subscription rate). I don't recommend trying to use these pouches to pour by-load detergent measurements, but after I purchased a couple 100oz bottles from the store I can use these pouches to refill them. The pour spout is well designed; take off the cap, tip it over the bottle and it drains completely. No squeezing, gurgling or trying to suck air; just completely drains into the bottle and when it stops the pouch is empty to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend purchasing Tide this way
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend purchasing Tide this way. I am still astounded at how much more Tide I can get for the money than I can at the grocery store. Also I know people probably pour these bags into the traditional plastic container, but I find that the plastic containers take up significantly less room in the laundry room and make for much easier storage and dispensing. I will only ever buy Tide this way.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Scent completely "off" the second time I ordered...
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging, convenience, quality of product and cost. So easy to just fill the container I already have, and use from there. I was so happy with the purchase the first time, that I ordered again - this time, the scent is completely different, and very overpowering (especially on the clothes that I hang to dry, rather than put in the dryer). Definitely NOT the original scent Tide this time around. So disappointed; one of the biggest reasons I use Tide is because of the scent - it reminds me of growing up.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie2878

customer_reviews.title: Same quality Tide for less per ounce and using less plastic
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had found these sooner. I put them on subscribe and save and now I never run out of laundry detergent! And I'm not buying plastic bottle after plastic bottle from the store. I keep one medium size bottle that even my youngest kid can handle, and just refill it with these over and over. Winning!
customer_reviews.author: J. Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for moldy/musty smell in some pouches
customer_reviews.text: Started to buy in these refill pouches about a year ago and have rebought five times - the first four purchases were great. The latest the scent was very off - moldy, musty. If you buy, make sure you smell the detergent before using it - if normal scent this is a great way to buy - if unusual send it back because if you wash clothes in it you will have to rewash them a few times in normal smelling detergent to get the moldy/musty smell out. I would have returned except I didn’t start using these until the 30 day return window was up so make sure you check the smell right when it it delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, awesome packaging
customer_reviews.text: I know these are refills but I use them as is because they are easier to store, lighter, and easier to throw away. Love love love them. I switched to tide just because of these pouches and I see why people are so brand loyal as it's a great detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like Tide detergent for feeling like my laundry is truly getting clean. While these are intended for refilling a container of Tide, I actually preferred them for pouring directly into my washing machine dispenser. They're smaller and lighter than the large Tide containers and were easier for me and my children to handle when doing laundry. I would highly recommend these smart pouches.
customer_reviews.author: K.F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: These are great either to refill your current bottle or to use as is. Pours very nicely and removes the toughest stains. The quantity is great for the price. Came without any leaks are issues. Highly recommend these I will keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: No longer effective.
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this Tide 15 times using subscribe and save. It is no longer the same product. Doesn’t get clothes clean, no tide smell, etc. Just to be sure it wasn’t my machine, I bought a bottle of Tide from the grocery and the difference was night and day. I can smell the clean scent when I open my closet again. And, more importantly, my clothes are getting clean!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Convenient to store in small living spaces
customer_reviews.text: These pouches are even more convenient than I expected. They take up so little storage space that it's no big deal to order more when I'm down to my last pouch. I just kept my last regular container and pouring the detergent from the pouch is very easy, no spills so far.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the plastic jugs!
customer_reviews.text: I was just telling my husband that I wished I could refill my Tide dispenser jugs with a bag of Tide....and then there it was in my Amazon suggestions! I purchased a pack of 3 Tide refill bags. The whole bag fit in my dispenser and the lid can be replaced on the bag if you don’t have enough room. The bags came wrapped in a plastic baggie, which was handy considering one of the bags seemed to dribble a bit. I’m happy to avoid buying a lot of plastic jugs, but still get the detergent we like! I will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Foley

customer_reviews.title: Scent is Wrong
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered these pouches for the second time. However, there’s a serious problem. The scent is all messed up and doesn’t match up with the Tide product that I ordered. My wife agrees that this isn’t the right product. I wouldn’t recommend this any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J Martoccia

customer_reviews.title: Tide is the BEST!! Smells Great!! Liquid > Pods!
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to buy in bulk and save on money! I simply re-fill the plastic Tide jug that I previously had. Tide just simply cleans the best. Loads only need a small amount if you have a HE washer. I love the smell of Tide and it is just not worth going with bargain brands, especially when buyign in bulk here is basically the same cost as a cheap brand that does not clean as well. I have switched from pods to liquids as pods do not always fully dissolve in cold water and sometimes the outer layer sticks on clothes making you re-wash. Liquid > Pods! Please click the "Helpful" button below if you read this review!
customer_reviews.author: Casey JonesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Not cleaning our clothes. I tried everything even doubling the amount of detergent since I have an extra large washer. The clothes smell awful even when adding scented fabric softener. Switched to a different brand and it is like night and day!
customer_reviews.author: Pinklilly92

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to do
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Have purchased three times now and not had an issue with spills before opening. The cap twists off easy enough, when ready, and pours clean. The lining on the inside of the bag is a nice feature - it feels like most, if not all, of the detergent exits when refilling. The packaging then lies flat when thrown out. Only downside is the bag is not recyclable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe2496

customer_reviews.title: I use this quite a bit
customer_reviews.text: I do price checks though and if I find it for less else where I buy it. I keep a box in my closet and I keep one going in the laundry room. I miss the clear see through containers they used to come in. I do not like the orange ones because I can not see through them. I know they did it because there are some people who are not able to protect their children and still others who are stupid and try to eat them.. sigh. It cleans really well and I use it for all of my laundry needs.
customer_reviews.author: AR Grover

customer_reviews.title: Safe your money
customer_reviews.text: Great way of buying the leading best detergent on the market today Look at the per ounce cost/value of this item and you be happy you did Every time I purchase something online, I always check the reviews. I count on others to help me choose the best option. My reviews are always my honest opinion and I try to include photos if possible. If my review has helped you in any way, please click the "helpful" button below so that I know! If you have any questions feel free to ask! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: G. R.

customer_reviews.title: Bad stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is not an HE product. All the way ends up with soap and requires many rinsing, even with lower quantities. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Stain Removal
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used many different brands of laundry detergent and Tide is the best at getting stains out. My husband spilled Alfredo sauce that spilled out of to go container. It was dark so he didn’t see it leaking so the oily creamy sauce got all over his new cotton sweater and his khaki pants. We’ put them in the wash with Tide and both came out spotless. I love these pouches because it’s less waste. I keep recycling an old bottle but it’s not necessary to have a bottle because the cap can rescrew in. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMistress

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Buy the regular. Doesnt last as long as its supposed to
customer_reviews.author: MomOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Something is "OFF"
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of the ease of these pouches for delivery. However, the scent was "off". Smells weird. I went to target and opened a bottle from the shelf to see if I was just crazy. What was on the shelf at target did not smell like what I received in this order. I can't say its horrible but its not great. The clothes did seem clean though. The smell even overpowers my liquid Downy in the wash. I would not waste your money on this!!
customer_reviews.author: CinnGirl

customer_reviews.title: Something I love about the bags..
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these about once every 5-6 months. There is something about the bags that makes the scent smell so much better. I enjoy it more than in the bottle, maybe its the plastic that changes the scent? I'm not sure. Easy to pour out of, and light! You don't have to worry about a messy cap. I've done enough laundry that I am good with eye-balling the amount in the detergent tray. :) Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Great refills
customer_reviews.text: Works great for refilling my large Tide (or any other brand I suppose) dispenser in the laundry room. I like to use the liquid dispenser type container but they are ridiculously priced in the store. Just refill with these for a much better price!!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to ship; GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is GREAT (It's Tide!!). The packaging is handy. Shipping proved difficult. The box came clearly marked which direction to ship, but whomever boxed it up had laid it on the wrong side, thus one of the bottles burst and I had to clean up all three bags before I could even get them out of the box! I'm ordering again, though, because this was so convenient!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Reuse old detergent container
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy I have this item on subscribe and save. The packaging makes it convenient to reuse an old laundry detergent container. I was skeptical at first but pouring these into the old container was easy (little left behind). Of course the Tide brand is reliable for cleaning clothes so no complaints there. Items arrive in box, reducing risk of damage.
customer_reviews.author: A Casey

customer_reviews.title: Not appropriate for shipping
customer_reviews.text: Don’t order this product to be shipped. It leaked all over 2 boxes and all my other items. Amazon wanted me to send it back but the mess was not worth dealing with it Will never order again
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Arrived opened and ruined other products in shipment
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product every two months for the last two years. My most recent shipment was damaged and this detergent got all over everything else in the shipment. Poor rating is for shipment not for actual product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Love my tide
customer_reviews.text: I love getting these delivered and the bag is very easy to use and lift. Handy spout. Tide is my go to detergent. It leaves clothes very clean. I use regular tide while my daughter uses Tide clear as she has sensitive skin. She reports it’s easier on her skin which is dry. Either choice is great. My Maytag guy told me years ago that where soap is important water is even more important. Towels will collect to much soap residue so go easy on using soap on towel loads. Lots of hot water cleans towels.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle wolf

customer_reviews.title: Convenient refills - same great Tide.
customer_reviews.text: Same Tide product we get at the store conveniently delivered to our home. We’ve purchased this numerous times because we like the refill pouches and reusing our plastic bottle at home. The pouches stand up on their own for storage which is handy, but definitely need to dispense into a different container for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Vanderhoof

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic idea for both tide to have as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic idea for both tide to have as well as Amazon to sell. I live in an apartment in New York City without tons of room. I would always buy the large bottles of tide with the spout and keep a small bottle I would refill to take with me to the laundromat. By having the smaller sized refill bottles I save a ton of space in my apartment But still get a great deal on detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Best idea ever. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I hope you continue to carry these refill style pouches. They are easy to store. Super easy to refill the last container I bought. And less bulky plastic bottles going into landfills. I am sad that your out for my subscription. Will have to go to walmart and grab a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie lou Bairefoot

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Amazon replaced my original order after it arrived busted open. I've been buying these for almost a year. Lasts me longer than 6 months. I also like that I don't have to keep paying for plastic containers, I can just refill.
customer_reviews.author: courtney g.

customer_reviews.title: A good environmental change.
customer_reviews.text: The same reliable Tide, just with a lot less wasted plastic, packaging, and postage. Pour directly into washing machine or refill your empty Tide jug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer TN

customer_reviews.title: Greatest laundry detergent,  greatest price delivered to your door.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the only brand I've used for all my adult life. I get these delivered to my door, while saving through the Subscribe and Save offers. These are meant to be poured into the container you're presently using, to reduce waste- and these bladders are recyclable, too.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective and cuts down on waste
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to cut down on plastic waste. I just refill my large dispenser bottle with these. Easy to do with the spout on the bags. Cheaper too!
customer_reviews.author: debra starr

customer_reviews.title: I love these "bags" of Tide
customer_reviews.text: I am a 77-year-0ld senior citizen and have found that sometimes those huge bottles of detergent are heavy and hard to handle. These pouches are easier to store and use. I'm glad I discovered them and buy them regularly. Through Amazon they get delivered to me and I'm a very happy "old lady."
customer_reviews.author: S. Skaryd

customer_reviews.title: Same Product, Less Wasteful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to buying a new jug of detergent every month. These refills are easy to pour into your original container and are more eco-friendly. It's the same detergent that you buy at the store so there is no sacrifice of quality. Plus, it's way more convenient to have these delivered. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Olea

customer_reviews.title: Cleans greasy clothes
customer_reviews.text: I use Tide on our dirty, greasy clothes, and Tide does a good job of getting them clean. I kept old bottles of Tide to fill with the pouches, and is easy to transfer it with the pour spout. I have never had a problem with leakage during shipment until today, and I probably had 2 loads go to waste in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma's Park

customer_reviews.title: Purchase these frequently
customer_reviews.text: I buy these on my subscribe and save account. I keep a Tide plastic bottle and transfer the liquid in these to the bottle and use the cap on the bottle to add detergent to the washer. I have found this to be a cheaper way to purchase quality laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Economical
customer_reviews.text: I like purchasing Tide in these containers as it is cheaper and less plastic. I use them to refill my big, bulk container in my laundry room. I think the scent is different than it used to be, but I like it and my daughter comments on how "fresh" her clothes smell.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love 💕 the pour feature
customer_reviews.text: Love 💕 love these disperse packets! Makes pouring super easy ! They don’t take up a lot of room and don’t leak! Packaging is superior and have ordered a ton of these , without disappointment! Gain has the same pour feature and love 💕 . Great for kids starting out doing laundry. It is friendly for the kids to handle .
customer_reviews.author: Cindee and Mike Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a 4 because it arrives leaky
customer_reviews.text: I like the reduced packaging and size of these better than the regular bottles. I would've given them a 5, but they arrived leaky and I had to clean up the packages as well as another item in the same box. Nothing was ruined, but it took a little extra time.
customer_reviews.author: Spatty

customer_reviews.title: Far less ends up in the landfill
customer_reviews.text: We love these pouches. Our county doesn't have a recycling program and it makes us nuts to put plastic jugs in the trash. These pouches are perfect. Same Tide that you know and love. Less plastic!
customer_reviews.author: A. Barstow

customer_reviews.title: Damage
customer_reviews.text: Product received damaged. Tide detergent had leaked in the box it was packaged in and the box it was shipped in.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Shipment should arrive not damaged
customer_reviews.text: I received 3 but 1 leaked out the washing powder -it was spilled all in box - not acceptable
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great for toploaders.
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad to have different packaging options now that I’ve switched to a top loader. I can’t use the pods anymore but also didn’t want those big hard containers. These bags are so much more convenient for both filling and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Kay

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent packaging ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tide. It is the same as the tide detergent sold in stores but the packaging is so much better! It is light weight and it doesn’t leak. I won’t go back to bulky bottles ever!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the plastic jugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I hate having to buy plastic jugs over and over, so wasteful and bulky when empty so these are a great alternative. Refilling existing containers is easy and these store nicely in laundry cupboards. Price difference is minimal from buying the jugs.
customer_reviews.author: LJD

customer_reviews.title: The Key Here Is Refillable Pouches
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but the key for us is that the pouches allow us to refill the main container. Now if Tide developed a 'pouch return' program' then life would be better. In the meantime, the product is a step in the right direction for recycling!!
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Legge

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I love Tide. I’m pretty sure these are fake. First time in years of using Tide that our clothes aren’t clean and smell terrible. Don’t buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Leyna Singh

customer_reviews.title: Terrible New (or Defective?) Scent
customer_reviews.text: Used to be great, but either the scent has changed or we’ve received several defective boxes. The last few boxes contain detergent pouches that smell terrible - more like bug spray than Tide. Asked my hubby to cancel our subscribe & save.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ormond

customer_reviews.title: I love getting these to refill my Tide jug
customer_reviews.text: I love getting these to refill my Tide jug, it feels like there is a lot less waste. Also, it is very nice getting these on Subscribe and Save since I no longer need to worry about getting it at the store and lugging them home. Tide is one of my favorite laundry soaps as it always gets our clothes clean and smelling fresh. This is not always a guarantee as my husband works in a mine!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Love original scent tide and these convenient refill pouches
customer_reviews.text: Love the way Tide cleans and smells. And it makes it even better having these pouches to refill, no more throwing away bulky containers or storing them. Love having it on subscription service and the price, especially the discount with our 5 or more subscription items.
customer_reviews.author: kbbels

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I order that product regularly. I love the convenience the product offers, with good price that brings great value to working products. I bought once the original container of the same brand and type of detergent, and since then I buy only the pouches and fills the big bottle with the cup. very recommended!
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: Love these Pouches
customer_reviews.text: The pouches are lightweight and I can easily pour the Tide into an empty bottle that I already have in my washroom. This eliminates recycling the big plastic jugs and having to rinse them out. Same great he Tide but in a better package.
customer_reviews.author: Debshirl

customer_reviews.title: NOT Original Scent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for the first time because I loved the idea of getting the same product that I have used for years with less packaging and less waste. I was very disappointed when I used it the first time and discovered the scent is nothing like the Tide original scent I know and love. The classic original scent is part of the reason I buy Tide. I am definitely not a fan of this new scent and am dreading that my laundry will be smelling like this until I use it up. I had put it on subscribe and save but I will be canceling right away.
customer_reviews.author: marceekay

customer_reviews.title: Scent has changed
customer_reviews.text: The scent has changed since I first purchased this item early in 2019. I received my second suscribe and save in January 2020 and it almost smells like Tide with Febreeze which is overpowering. Fix this issue!
customer_reviews.author: NicholeF

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Economical Cleans Well!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent soap, works well. Great buy. I love these collapsible bags so I can refill my bottle and track my use without the use of those messy small cups.
customer_reviews.author: gr8tchr4u

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Pouch Not Recyclable
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see any recycling symbol on the pouches, so I called P&G's phone number to inquire. They said that the pouches are NOT recyclable. I previously didn't like wasting the large plastic dispensers (which ARE recyclable), and figured these would have a lower impact on the environment. While these bags may contain a bit less plastic than the hard plastic dispensers, making them NOT recyclable seems to defeat my attempt at being environmentally conscientious.
customer_reviews.author: MojoRobbins

customer_reviews.title: Horrible allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I do not have particularly sensitive skin but this detergent caused me to break out in a horrible rash on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, Tide talks for itself. I love this packaging it’s easy to carry to the laundromat, it’s flat, closed great easy to poor out of it
customer_reviews.author: T C

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised I never knew ordering laundry detergent refills was a option!! I would much rather this than have to lug jugs around every few weeks!! Will definitely purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: KatieLady682

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have a refillable bottle or other container
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a container so I just use it straight from the pouch. It works fine, like regular Tide detergent in bottles. The only thing is it doesn't come with a measuring cup so you'll need something like that from past purchase or a regular measuring cup you don't use for anything else, because you don't want to eat Tide detergent. Don't eat Tide Pods kids.
customer_reviews.author: Feizhu84

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle and soap is left inside the pouch.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like you waste some of the soap in the pouch when refilling the main container. Some is left behind in the pouch. I would recommend just buying a new container instead of these refill pouches.
customer_reviews.author: Latisha Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Tide Clean & Reuse Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I need to use Tide due to our water. Nothing looks clean otherwise. I like the bags that can refill my Tide bottle. I hope they are a better recyclable than the plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: ArtsyLady

customer_reviews.title: Not piratical or the best financially responsible way to refill the dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I had thought it was a great way to refill my laundry soap dispenser... but the bags were not 140 loads only 90 each which seemed to be less than economical fir purchasing. The spout is ideal and the concept is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: If your clothes stink, use it. It works. Other than that - what can I say. Price was right with a coupon just before the holidays - you won't completely fill one of the large tide jugs but I do like the reduced waste from this packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Web Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great product and packaging suits my need
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use these to refill a bottle. I store them in the pedestal and use them directly as they are. Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Less plastic but not less money
customer_reviews.text: I attempt to be more economical friendy, meaning using less and smarter resources and less space. The 3 packages are great to store and dispose. They should be less expensive than buying the standard bulky object, that is hard to digest by the nature. The handling of the box can be smarter to insert the detergent into the washing machine directly.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Wife  2020

customer_reviews.title: COMPACT PACKAGING
customer_reviews.text: I am a tree-hugger and the less material used in packaging; the better. I like how these fit in the drawer of my washing machine stand. The rigid detergent bottles are a bit tall and I have to lay them down in order to close the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Sap

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. They are less messy than the big bottles with caps. I have a portable washer so I fill up a hand soap container with this and I know exactly how many pumps to use for my washer. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Kristen G.

customer_reviews.title: Love the new packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love the new packaging, Makes me feel as if I am contribution to the waste reduction on the planet. I have saved and old bottle and that is how I choose to dispense the product. It would be nice to see other product follow suite.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L Leedy

customer_reviews.title: Great refills
customer_reviews.text: The packaging makes it easy to refill an old bottle. I get this on subscription with Amazon . I just wish they came in other scents (the sport oxi version).
customer_reviews.author: WVmtnmomma

customer_reviews.title: No allergies
customer_reviews.text: I e been ordering tide for a long time! It’s a bit more expensive than other brands! But works good and don’t give up us allergy
customer_reviews.author: Unbelievable Movie

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, and I love the ability to refill ...
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, and I love the ability to refill a container, however, one of the bags leaked all over, dripping through the house getting the box to where I could clean it all up; and soaked into the Bounce fabric softener sheets, needing several to be thrown away and the ones I could salvage, placed in a zip-lock bag.
customer_reviews.author: B G

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted to be able to refill my detergent bottle with this type of package. Buying it in a three pack assures I have plenty on hand. Buying by Subscribe and Save makes certain I will always have some on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Pghgrl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I hate that I'm always throwing away big empty bottles. These are so much more convenient and take up less space. Still plastic but it makes me feel a little better about my waste. I wish I was able to find the scent I like but this scent is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Vee

customer_reviews.title: Good And Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I buy these on Prime all the time; I hate to run out of laundry detergent and have to make a trip to the store. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Granimals70Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Superior cleaning power.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely favorite laundry detergent works amazing on stains, dirt, and smells. Always provides a superior clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to rebuying plastic jugs over and over
customer_reviews.text: because of this offering I have been able to use the same tide plastic bottle for a couple years now. bags are sturdy enough that I feel save storing them and they pour very easily into the plastic jug
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: The product is of great quality and easy to use. It also arrived on time and is as described.
customer_reviews.text: The product is of great quality and easy to use. It also arrived on time and is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same great cleaning power without having to go to store to pick up a large bottle to lug home
customer_reviews.text: Great way to refill the solid bottle. Great name brand you know from the box stores or grocery with the same great cleaning power without having to go to store to pick up a large bottle to lug home. 93 loads with less gas spent and less footprint on the earth.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Great value all around!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Tide with fabric softener so at first i was a bit apprehensive but it still comes out of the washer smelling fresh. Plus these containers are easier to dispose of then the hard containers. Fast delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: Lan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful brand.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand I have used for many years. It simply works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes clothes washery a snap
customer_reviews.text: Well let's start off with this - It's Tide. The best part is the packaging, it's in collapsible bags which help reduce the amount of waste in the environment if you are in to that, and it's a heck of a lot easier to pour in to my new fancy washer's soap container. Plus it's shipped to my door and cheaper than anywhere Incan get it locally
customer_reviews.author: K. VanWagner

customer_reviews.title: Economic way to buy Tide!  🧡🧡🧡
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these on Subscribe and Save, and I think it’s about the most economical way to buy Tide. I use them to refill the regular detergent bottles. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: MCL11

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect solution. I have this auto shipped monthly
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect solution. I have this auto shipped monthly, so I never have to worry about running out and trying to find a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use refill packaging
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to refill the tide clean precision Ez kit bottles. I am finding this packaging to be cheaper than the intended refills. I really like Tide and don't mind paying a bit extra for it versus other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Good slim packaging
customer_reviews.text: Get this through subscribe and save and love the refillable packaging. Very slim to fit in a laundry cabinet so we stock up since they don’t take up much space. Detergent itself is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan L

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bag exploded in shipping container. Lost a bag due to the bag breaking. Such a waste
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Great environmentally friendly way to refill!
customer_reviews.text: Great value, and I like that I can reduce waste by filling and reusing my containers. Same good tide product, just less packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Longhorn

customer_reviews.title: Tide
customer_reviews.text: I like these I feel like I'm saving space but maybe they just fit my small laundry area better. Obviously Tide is Tide just the package is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Doug White

customer_reviews.title: Used many years
customer_reviews.text: We have this detergent delivered on a regular basis. Works great and wife is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: louise a rhinehart

customer_reviews.title: Easier than going to the store
customer_reviews.text: Good deal just refill my jug with these will be buying again
customer_reviews.author: clamper

customer_reviews.title: Old school quailty product meets new packaging
customer_reviews.text: Less waste and durable packaging.Very good price on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Njoyinlife

customer_reviews.title: These are great. You can refill your existing Tide bottle and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. You can refill your existing Tide bottle and the way the bag is designed, all of the detergent comes out quickly with none leftover and no mess. This will save a lot of bottles from having to be recycled.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Leak
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great container. I love it. To actually poor the liquid is very simple and handy. Would have gotten 5 starts except the container seems to leak a little in the shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: very manual and easy to pour let me know when i can buy it again need it can wait to buy it again
customer_reviews.author: nick g

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: Of course this is great product it’s tide and smells great too
customer_reviews.author: Ray Aceves

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: It’s great to grab these and have detergent for a while. Easy to store
customer_reviews.author: Josh Raab

product_meta.title: Tide Laundry Detergent Liquid, Original Scent, HE Turbo Clean, Pack of 3 Smart Pouches, 93 Loads Total
product_meta.description:
Size:48 Fl Oz (Pack of 3)

Tide Original Scent is a powerful liquid laundry detergent that is formulated with HE Turbo Clean technology for 6x the cleaning power in half the time*. Your beloved Tide Original Scent HE Turbo Clean liquid laundry detergent is now available in a revolutionary Tide Smart Pouch that uses 60% less packaging**

Tide Smart Pouch packaging makes your laundry detergent more convenient to store and really easy to use; just pour it from the pouch into an empty Tide bottle or use it directly from the pouch using a measuring cup. Enjoy great cleaning performance from innovative packaging.

*1 dose of Tide HE Turbo Clean in quick cycle vs. 6 doses of the leading bargain brand detergent, base variant in normal cycle

**weight vs 50 oz. bottle
feature_bullets: Liquid laundry detergent with 6X cleaning power in half the time. (1 dose of tide he turbo clean in quick cycle vs. 6 doses of the leading bargain brand detergent, base variant in normal cycle)
A convenient, easy to use pouch that uses 60% less packaging and lets you reuse your empty tide bottle. (Weight vs 50 oz. Bottle)
Brilliant cleaning performance that leaves behind a refreshing original scent
Specially designed for he washing machines; Safe to use on both whites and color clothes.
No. 1 recommended by leading washing machine manufacturers. (Based on co-marketing agreements)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
